channel.title: CVE Feed for someguy9 -- Lightweight Accordion
channel.description: The latest CVEs for someguy9 -- Lightweight Accordion

item.title: CVE-2024-2436|2024-04-09T18:58:48.811Z -- someguy9 -- lightweight%20accordion
item.description: The Lightweight Accordion plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's shortcode(s) in all versions up to, and including, 1.5.16 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
